mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, NAME, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, DELFLAG, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE DELFLAG = 'N'
SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, NAME, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, DELFLAG, UPDATE_DATE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{product_code}

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, NAME, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, DELFLAG, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS (PRODUCT_CODE, NAME, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, REG_DATE, DELFLAG, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (PRODUCTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, SYSDATE, 'N', SYSDATE)
